https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kho48mWJ5xuiLn5bpuIvO6ZP7ep.jpg A crime-drama, about the cultural aversion of a group of punk rockers in a conservative Texas town. Their ongoing battle with a rival, more-affluent clique leads to a controversial hate crime that questions the morality of American justice. Bomb City
